name: CTS (Karo-8870)
description:
Circles, Triangles, Squares is an online 10v10v10 Battle royale PvP or PvE. In it there are 3 teams (Circles, Triangles, Squares) that will fight to death using tools and weapons crafted with natural resources. However, now you can only gather wood and rocks, craft chests and use them.

It is my first game so please don't be rude and leave a revew (bad or good).

I am waiting for sugestions!
